医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
Ingenza 宣布与 Cellugy 合作研究生物制造纤维素的潜力工业生物技术专家 Ingenza 很高兴地宣布，它正在与 Cellugy 合作，加速开发其用于生产生物制造纤维素的创新平台。该技术将为各种工业应用（从个人护理开始）提供化石石化产品的可持续替代品。新项目最终将加速对细菌纤维素生产的理解和优化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/Ingenza-announces-partnership-with-Cellugy-to-investigate-the-pottial-of-biofabricated-纤维素.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/Ingenza-announces-partnership-with-Cellugy-to-investigate-the-potial-of-biofabricated-纤维素.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=83e2ffb9-a98e-4347-9931-efec654df1cb Fri, 30 Aug 2024 07:19:00 -0400 Ingenza announces partnership with Cellugy to investigate the potential of biofabricated cellulose
重新定义 5hmC：不仅仅是 DNA 去甲基化途径的垫脚石一个重要的 DNA 修饰是甲基化，即在胞嘧啶的第 5 个碳上添加甲基。它形成 5-甲基胞嘧啶 (5mC)，通常与基因表达的抑制相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/Redefining-5hmC-More-than-just-a-stepping-stone-in-the-DNA-demethylation-pathway.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/Redefining-5hmC-More-than-just-a-stepping-stone-in-the-DNA-demethylation-pathway.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4e12ccf3-7717-4fea-8d80-aeb8242a4c07 Fri, 30 Aug 2024 07:15:00 -0400 Redefining 5hmC: More than just a stepping stone in the DNA demethylation pathway
Micropore 任命 Insung Chroma-Tech Co 为韩国经销商Micropore Technologies 刚刚宣布任命 Insung Chroma-Tech Co. 作为其专利膜技术在韩国市场的经销商https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/Micropore-appoints-Insung-Chroma-Tech-Co-as-korean-distributor.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/Micropore-appoints-Insung-Chroma-Tech-Co-as-korean-distributor.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b8c7528a-365c-440d-a5db-6060f8e815ce Fri, 30 Aug 2024 07:08:00 -0400
微孔任命新首席执行官凯在公司的一个重要转折点加入该公司。 Micropore 正在从早期概念验证转变为完全开发的药物输送解决方案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/Micropore-appoints-new-CEO.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/Micropore-appoints-new-CEO.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d4540377-c68e-490a-b78b-b0042cf35725 Fri, 30 Aug 2024 07:07:00 -0400 Micropore appoints new CEO
伊沙尼·马尔霍特拉 (Ishani Malhotra) 被癌症研究视野评为“年度女企业家”英国癌症研究中心的创新部门癌症研究地平线 (Cancer Research Horizo​​ns) 于 3 月 20 日在伦敦举行的晚宴上宣布了第二届创新与创业奖的获奖者名单。这些奖项旨在表彰英国在肿瘤学领域最具创新性和进取精神的个人。该行业正在努力将发现转化为癌症患者的益处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/Ishani-Malhotra-named-e28098woman-entrepreneur-of-the-yeare28099-by-cancer-research-horizo​​ns.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/Ishani-Malhotra-named-e28098woman-entrepreneur-of-the-yeare28099-by-cancer-research-horizo​​ns.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5dd6ece7-c0b2-45af-8b52-7fb5861828ac Fri, 30 Aug 2024 06:55:00 -0400 Ishani Malhotra named ‘woman entrepreneur of the year’ by cancer research horizons
Carcinotech 发表了关于患者来源的 3D 打印肿瘤的研究，作为药物开发的突破性工具组织工程和 3D 生物打印的进步彻底改变了生理相关 3D 体外癌症模型的开发，提供了肿瘤微环境 (TME) 的更接近的表征并实现了高通量药物筛选。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/Carcinotech-publishes-research-on-病人-衍生-3D-printed-tumors-as-a-breakthrough-tool-for-drug-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/Carcinotech-publishes-research-on-病人-衍生-3D-printed-tumors-as-a-breakthrough-tool-for-drug-development.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=92684502-94af-4467-972e-47b674a68766 Fri, 30 Aug 2024 05:02:00 -0400 Carcinotech publishes research on patient-derived 3D-printed tumors as a breakthrough tool for drug development
第一代抗组胺药可能会增加幼儿癫痫发作的风险研究表明，第一代抗组胺药可能会增加幼儿癫痫发作的风险，这凸显了谨慎处方的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/First- Generation-antihistamine-drugs-could-increase-seizure-risk-among-young-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/First- Generation-antihistamine-drugs-could-increase-seizure-risk-among-young-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=67d7f863-19d5-4d33-91fd-5e2fcc0e2ccb Fri, 30 Aug 2024 05:00:00 -0400 First-generation antihistamine drugs could increase seizure risk among young children
Carcinotech 主导夏季颁奖季在过去的六年里，Carcinotech 一直专注于开发、优化和商业化我们的创新药物开发平台。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/Carcinotech-dominates-summer-awards-season.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/Carcinotech-dominates-summer-awards-season.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9f5b91c8-a936-4a02-bcf9-09e7e087421c Fri, 30 Aug 2024 04:59:00 -0400 Carcinotech dominates summer awards season

Juan Pablo Ramírez Torrealba 成为智利新任总经理Benchmark Genetics Chile 很高兴地宣布，Juan Pablo Ramírez Torrealba 将接替 Berta Contreras Mutis 担任总经理，后者将寻求新的职业机会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/Juan-Pablo-Ramirez-Torrealba-is-a-new-General-Manager-in-chile.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/Juan-Pablo-Ramirez-Torrealba-is-a-new-General-Manager-in-chile.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7fb94f36-e52e-4f62-b24f-860ef6060fd9 Fri, 30 Aug 2024 04:01:00 -0400 Juan Pablo Ramírez Torrealba is a new General Manager in chile
